TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示包含规则匹配时运行的 ECMAScript 的标记。

span.span: Represents a tag that contains ECMAScript that is run when the rule is matched.
Creates an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个语义转译标记 , 其属性包含空字符串。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property contains an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string script) cil managed

param.name: script
param.span: 包含标记的 [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) for the tag.

summary.span: 创建 类的实例，指定标记的脚本内容。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class, specifying the script contents of the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个语义转译标记 , 其属性设置为中`script`的值。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property is set to the value in `script`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Script { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
